SELECT dcts.*, dctsc.NAME AS category_name FROM devops_ci_template_step dcts JOIN devops_ci_template_step_category dctsc ON dcts.category_id = dctsc.id
WHERE 1=1 AND dcts.visibility=1
and (dcts.source_id = 0 OR dcts.source_id = #{sourceId})
and (dcts.source_id = 0 OR dcts.source_id = #{sourceId})
AND (dcts.source_id = 0 OR dcts.source_id= #{organizationId} OR dcts.source_id=#{sourceId} )
AND dcts.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND dctsc.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND dctsc.id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND dcts.built_in = 1
AND dcts.built_in = 0
AND dcts.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{params, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
ORDER BY field( dcts.source_type, 'project', 'organization', 'site' ) ASC, dcts.id desc, field( dcts.built_in, '0', '1' ) ASC
